CustomField.description: If checked, then this chart of accounts corresponds to a Finance initiative that normally isn't assigned by non-Finance staff, for example, to opportunities, gifts, and projections.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, then this chart of accounts corresponds to a Finance initiative that normally isn't assigned by non-Finance staff, for example, to opportunities, gifts, and projections.
CustomField.label: Finance initiative sub-account
